column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Once the bowl arrived
column2: I went about my usual process. Appearance? Reasonable. Broth? Creamy and flavorful
column3: but not too salty. My anticipation rose
column4: but then I took a big bite of the ramen noodles and was instantly disappointed. They lack the chewiness I expect from quality ramen. This made it difficult to fully embrace the rest of my meal
column5: although I'll admit they make a deliciously seasoned soft-boiled egg.
